mintee is a minimalist time tracker

Launching early 2025

Runs Anywhere

Works perfectly in the browser. But can be installed on your mobile or desktop for a user experience like that of a platform-specific app.

Local-first

You own your data, and the network is optional. Once loaded, the app works even when you're offline. No spinners.

Free and Open Source

Start tracking for free! No registration or credit card is required. Feeling adventurous? Download the source code and hack on it!

Sign up for early access

You will be notified when the app launches. No spam.
